Tom,
  I did a google search for "SF Sword Group" and found two groups. I thought I recognized your name on the NCJSC website in the highly powered and illustrious position of board member. I take it the next meeting is January 8th. What time does the meeting start? The NCJSC site doesn't say. 
   
  Do you know anything about the other group called SF Japanese Sword Society?
   
  Anthony

Tom Helm <junkmail@...> wrote:
  Beautiful Ken!
      Truth is often found in jest! You all are most welcome here, study  
your books yes. Come see the sword shows and by all means join us at  
a sword club meeting if you can make it. We may not sound serious but  
we're seriously glad to have you join us...
-t
